job.title: Remote Full Stack Engineer
job.description: If you are a Full Stack Engineer with experience please read onbrbrWe are a non profit looking to change the lives of students that have a difficulty learning We provide tools to educators that help them transform the way they teach and the way the students learn We help educators identify the learning issues early on and then work to help the prevent them in the future Our award winning software is helping students all over the world and helping to make a real difference in the education systembrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrYou will set technology standards and direct the execution of the initiatives from inception through implementation You will be working with the engineering teams to solve problems and establishing and improving internal processes You will directly contribute to the growth and development of the software team by providing guidance and coaching to your peersbrbrWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli 5 years of experience as a software engineerlili Experience delivering commercially deployed SaaS solutionslili Deep understanding of ObjectOriented Programming and Designlili Experience with Distributed Systemslili Proficient with NodeJS and related frameworkslili In depth knowledge of TypeScript and JavaScriptlili Experience with SQL and NoSQL databaseslili Experience with RESTful APIs and GraphQLlili Experience managing CICD toolslili Experience deploying applications via CICD piplingeslili Experience managing Docker Kubernetes or other container systemsbrliulWhats In It for Youbrulli Salary 120k  130klili Fully remotelili Medical Dental Vision and life Insurancelili 401K planlili FSA AccountbrliulSo if you are a Full Stack Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrZackWaltzCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  ZW11645589  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulZack Waltz  Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
